detail_desc: T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Shorts in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with covered elastication.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Knee-length skirt in a cotton weave with pleats at the top and pockets in the side seams. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and tie belt. Unlined.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.

Shirt dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a small embroidery detail on the chest.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a metal buckle at the front. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist. Slightly looser fit with legs that taper gently to the hem. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves, elastication in the sides of the top layer and a gentle flare to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Padded sleep mask with an elastic strap at the back. Polyester lining.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shirt in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the front and a tie detail at the waist. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, an open section at the front and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Captain’s cap in an airy linen weave. Unlined.
Imitation leather card holder with four card slots and one note compartment. Size 7x10 cm.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with one welt back pocket, a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Short-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise on the front and sleeves. Collar, buttons down the front and scalloped edges at the sleeves and front hem. Unlined.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Nursing bra in soft microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.
Dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt. Unlined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned weave. High waist with covered elastication, and two flounced tiers to the hem. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, and tapered legs with smocking at the knees and ribbed hems.
Double-layered hats in organic cotton jersey.
Faux fur jacket with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet side pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Trousers in soft, thermal fleece with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Long raglan sleeves with mesh details. Seamless.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced hems, a reinforced back and adjustable elastic braces. Zip fly and press-stud, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Wide top in light sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles at the top and ties with a metal ring at the ends. Size 15x31x37 cm.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a lace trim and frills at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flounced cuffs, a concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt with a flounce and lace trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam and decorative tie detail at the waist. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a button on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Dress in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and buttons on one shoulder.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, chunky-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Padded ski mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, and elastication and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a round, scalloped neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a flounce detail, decorative gathers and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Dress in stretch jersey with a unique nursing feature and sewn-in wrapover at the front. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and flutter sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and frill trim at the top.
Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise sections. Square neckline front and back, a yoke with a wide flounce over the shoulders and a scalloped hem. Lined.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.
Short V-neck dress in jersey with a heavy drape. 3/4-length sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Thigh boots in a sturdy close knit made partly from recycled polyester with a stretchy shaft and pointed toes. Recycled polyester insoles. Heel 7 cm.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed details. Padded cups and wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Covered elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Set with an Alice band and a wand. Fabric-covered Alice band with a crown-shaped appliqué on top. Plastic wand decorated with a glittery star and thin satin ribbons.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft stretch jersey with a wide neckline and long sleeves.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short jacket in a textured, crinkled viscose weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
